paper_title: Tensor triangulated category structures in the derived category of a variety with big (anti-)canonical bundle
abstract: Let $X$ be a smooth projective variety over $\mathbb{C}$ with big (anti-)canonical bundle. It is known that in this situation the Balmer spectrum of the tensor triangulated category of perfect complexes $Perf(X)$ of $X$ equipped with the derived tensor product $\otimes_{X}^{\mathbb{L}}$ recovers the space $X$. In this work we study the possible tensor triangulated category structures one can put on $Perf(X)$. As an application we prove a monoidal version of the well-known Bondal-Orlov reconstruction theorem.
